DOC.brief_summary: Pharmacokinetic of Metoclopramide (MCP) in correlation to polymorphisms of CYP2D6 and Dopamine-D2-Receptor. Pharmacokinetic of Diphenhydramine (DPH) in correlation to polymorphisms of CYP2D6
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacogenetic Factors and Side Effects of Metoclopramide and Diphenhydramine
DOC.criteria: BMI 20 27kg/m2 Caucasians Healthy volunteers Pregnancy/lactation period Drug allergy Acute and chronic diseases Taking medication Abuse of drugs, alcohol etc. Smoker
